dimensions: H x diam.: 22.2 x 12.7 cm (8 3/4 x 5 in.)
title: Sweetmeat glass
provenance: Cecil Davis, LTD, London. (7-13-72) purchased by WPW.
description: Iverted double ogee bowl cut with flat flutes, blazes, a band of diamonds and a scalloped edge. Fluted stem with diamonds cut ring knop. Broad, circular domed foot has deep cut blazes in a swirl pattern. Pontil mark on bottom.
name: Sweetmeat glass
